verbs.description: Analysis : [ARG1: The talk of peace] [V: is] [ARG2: likely to weaken the two levers that Trump used to pressure Kim Jong Un to the bargaining table] .

Analysis : The talk of peace is likely to weaken [ARG1: the two levers] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: Trump] [V: used] [ARG2: to pressure Kim Jong Un to the bargaining table] .
Analysis : The talk of peace is likely to weaken the two levers that [ARG0: Trump] used to [V: pressure] [ARG1: Kim Jong Un] [ARG2: to the bargaining table] .
